title: Update footer attribution link to webzio.caffeine.app

requirements.summary: Update the site footer attribution hyperlink to point to https://webzio.caffeine.app and display the new domain as the anchor text while preserving new-tab and security attributes.
acceptanceCriteria: In the footer attribution, the hyperlink href is exactly "https://webzio.caffeine.app".
The visible link text in the footer attribution is exactly "webzio.caffeine.app".
The link still opens in a new tab and retains appropriate security attributes (target="_blank" and rel including "noopener noreferrer").

file_operations.description: Update the footer attribution <a> tag: change href from https://caffeine.ai to https://webzio.caffeine.app and change the visible anchor text to "webzio.caffeine.app", while keeping target="_blank" and rel including "noopener noreferrer" unchanged.
